Text: Be tender with your children, Lord, and to those who implore you, show your endless kindness. [t] That they will boast that you are the Creator, and author of providence. [*] With them in mind restore your creation, conserve, and protect it. Through Jesus Christ.
Changes: 2022-07-31 - Paul Prins: In adding a comma I missed adding another comma. Fixed that.
2022-06-20 - Paul Prins: Added a comma to separate two thoughts more clearly.
